phrases.phrase: If enabled, automatically generate index/next/previous threadmark links.
Hide threadmarks drop down menu from guests
If enabled, guests will have to click the threadmarks link to see the list of threadmarks.
What happens when you mouse over
The space above the Threadmarked post.
I think it's related to the sortable bits?
Styling of what you name the threadmark
The things you can move around when you're reorganizing your threadmarks
{name} created the threadmark {threadmark} on {poster}'s post in thread {title}
You do not have permission to add threadmarks.
You do not have permission to delete threadmarks.
You do not have permission to edit threadmarks.

property.title: Threadmarker
property.description: The space above the Threadmarked post.

property.title: Threadmark Label
property.description: Styling of what you name the threadmark

property.title: Threadmark Button Hover
property.description: What happens when you mouse over

property.title: Threadmark Sortable
property.description: The things you can move around when you're reorganizing your threadmarks

property.title: Threadmark JS Tree
property.description: I think it's related to the sortable bits?

templates.template:
<xen:title>{xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread, escaped}{$thread.title} - {xen:phrase edit_threadmark}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase edit_threadmark}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$nodeBreadCrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:posts, $post}">{xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:container var="$bodyClasses">{xen:helper nodeClasses, $nodeBreadCrumbs, $forum}</xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.thread"><xen:include template="search_bar_thread_only" /></xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.forum"><xen:include template="search_bar_forum_only" /></xen:container>
<form action="{xen:link 'posts/threadmark', $post}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase threadmark_label}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="label" id="ctrl_message" class="textCtrl" value="{$threadmark.label}" maxlength="255" <xen:if is="!{$post.canEditThreadmarks}">readonly</xen:if> /></dd>
<xen:if is="{$post.canDeleteThreadmarks}"> <dt> </dt> <dd><label><input type="checkbox" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> {xen:phrase delete_threadmark}</label></dd> </xen:if> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase update_threadmark}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{xen:phrase x_created_threadmark_in_thread_z, 'threadmark={$content.threadmark.label}', 'name={xen:if $content.threadmark.user_id, {xen:helper username, $content.threadmark, 'primaryText'}, '{xen:phrase unknown_member}'}', 'poster={xen:helper username, $content, 'primaryText'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'} {xen:phrase x_created_threadmark_on_ys_post_in_thread_z, 'threadmark={$content.threadmark.label}', 'name={xen:if $content.threadmark.user_id, {xen:helper username, $content.threadmark, 'primaryText'}, '{xen:phrase unknown_member}'}', 'poster={xen:helper username, $content, 'primaryText'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'}

{xen:helper snippet, $content.message, $xenOptions.newsFeedMessageSnippetLength, {xen:array 'stripQuote=1'}}

<xen:title>{xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread, escaped}{$thread.title} - {xen:phrase add_threadmark}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase add_threadmark}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$nodeBreadCrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:posts, $post}">{xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:container var="$bodyClasses">{xen:helper nodeClasses, $nodeBreadCrumbs, $forum}</xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.thread"><xen:include template="search_bar_thread_only" /></xen:container> <xen:container var="$searchBar.forum"><xen:include template="search_bar_forum_only" /></xen:container>
<form action="{xen:link 'posts/threadmark', $post}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" data-redirect="on">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase threadmark_label}:</label></dt> <dd><input type="text" name="label" id="ctrl_message" class="textCtrl" maxlength="255" /></dd>
<dt> </dt> <dd><label><input type="checkbox" name="add_last" value="1" {xen:checked 1}/> {xen:phrase add_threadmark_to_end}</label></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase add_threadmark}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
{xen:phrase threadmark}

{xen:phrase threadmarks}

{xen:phrase most_recent_threadmarks}:
  • {xen:phrase new} {$threadmark.label}
{xen:phrase view_all_threadmarks, 'count={$threadmarks.count}'}
{xen:phrase threadmarks}

• {xen:phrase threadmark}

    {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{xen:helper highlight, $thread.title, $search.search_query, 'highlight'}

    {xen:helper snippet, $threadmark.label, 150, {xen:array 'term={$search.search_query}', 'emClass=highlight', 'stripQuote=1'}}
    {xen:phrase post_by}: , {xen:phrase in_forum}: {$forum.title}

{xen:phrase threadmarks_for}: {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread, escaped}{$thread.title} {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread} {xen:phrase threadmarks_for}: {$thread.title} {$forum.title} {xen:helper threadPrefix, $thread}{$thread.title}
  • {xen:phrase new} {$threadmark.label}
    {xen:if {$threadmark.templateHelperChild}, {xen:raw $threadmark.templateHelperChild}} {xen:if {$threadmark.templateHelperEnd}, {xen:raw $threadmark.templateHelperEnd}}
{xen:phrase close}
{xen:phrase threadmark_previous} {xen:phrase threadmark_index} {xen:phrase threadmark_next}
{xen:phrase threadmark}: {$threadmark.label} {xen:phrase threadmark_history}

{xen:string nl2br, {$threadmark.label}}
{xen:string nl2br, {xen:helper wordtrim, $post.messageParsed, $xenOptions.discussionPreviewLength}}
{$post.username},

modification.description: Add threadmarks CSS to threads with threadmarks
Display threadmarks menu on single page threads
Add CSS class to posts with threadmark
Display threadmarks menu on multi-page threads
modification.find: {xen:phrase go_to_first_unread}

modification.description: Add threadmark nav to bottem of the post
